# Campaign Relationships

## Major Connections

```mermaid
graph TD
    subgraph "[[Major [[npcs|npcs]]|Major NPCs]]"
        A[Key NPCs]
    end
    
    subgraph "[[locations|locations]]"
        B[Important [[Places|Places]]]
    end
    
    subgraph "Factions"
        C[Organizations]
    end
    
    A --> B
    B --> C
    C --> A
```
